meanings.definition: A very large deal or transaction.
meanings.sent1: The company signed a megadeal to acquire a rival business.
meanings.sent2: Investors were excited about the megadeals announced at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The megadeal to buy the entire mountain of candy was too tempting to resist.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a megadeal, bringing joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The megadeal to build a new theme park was the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: Deals of immense value or significance.
meanings.sent1: The megadeals in the art world often involve famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: She always seeks out the best megadeals when shopping for antiques.
meanings.sent3: Finding a megadeal on vintage clothes felt like winning the lottery.
meanings.sent4: His friendship was a megadeal, always there to support her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The megadeal to save the endangered species was a turning point in conservation efforts.
